name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or Dragon card, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may put it into play instead if its printed cost is 3 or lower). Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Why do the gods make kings and queens, if not to protect the ones who can't protect themselves?"
label: Daenerys Targaryen (DotE)

name: Drogon
text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Drogon is attacking, kill each character the defending player controls with STR 1 or lower.
label: Drogon (DotE)

name: Rhaegal
text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Rhaegal is attacking, choose and stand another character you control. Then, if that character has the Dragon or Stormborn trait, stand Rhaegal. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Rhaegal (DotE)

name: Viserion
text: No attachments. Each Stormborn character you control gains stealth. While Viserion is attacking, each participating non-Dragon, non-Stormborn characters gets -2 STR.
label: Viserion (DotE)

name: Khal Drogo
text: Renown. Interrupt: When an Army or Dothraki character would be returned to your hand, discard 1 card from your hand to save it.
flavor: "Come, my blood. The stallions call, this place is ashes. It is time to ride."
label: Khal Drogo (DotE)

name: Galazza Galare
text: Reaction: After you marshal Galazza Galare, search the top 10 cards of your deck for, either: a [targaryen] character with printed cost 6 or higher, or up to 3 [targaryen] characters with printed cost 2 or lower. Reveal each searched-for card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Galazza Galare

name: Jhogo
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.
flavor: "Khaleesi, we saw him strike you. Would you see the color of his blood?"
label: Jhogo (DotE)

name: The Shavepate
text: Challenges Action: Pay X gold to put a character with printed cost X or lower into play from your discard pile. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "... I say that blood must pay for blood. Take one man from each of the families I have named and kill him. The next time one of yours is slain, take two from each great House and kill them both. There will not be a third murder."
label: The Shavepate

name: Rakharo
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponent's hand.
flavor: "Khaleesi, better a man should swallow scorpions than trust in the spawn of shadows, who dare not show their face beneath the sun. It is known."
label: Rakharo (DotE)

name: The Titan's Bastard
text: Action: Kneel The Titan's Bastard to return a Mercenary character from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: "That one has an evil reputation, even in Westeros. Do not be misled by his manner, Your Grace." <cite>Ser Barristan Selmy</cite>
label: The Titan's Bastard

name: Barsena Blackhair
text: No attachments except Weapon. While there is a Weapon attachment attached to Barsena Blackhair, she gets +3 STR.
flavor: Daenerys would have prohibited contests between women as well, but Barsena Blackhair protested that she had as much right to risk her life as any man.
label: Barsena Blackhair

name: Captain Groleo
text: Reaction: After an attachment enters play, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: At first Groleo had wanted the dragons caged and Dany had consented to put his fears at ease, but their misery was so palpable that she soon changed her mind and insisted they be freed.
label: Captain Groleo

name: Blue Graces
text: Challenges Action: Remove Blue Graces from the game to choose a card with printed cost 6 or higher in your discard or dead pile and shuffle it into your deck.
label: Blue Graces

name: Dothraki Handmaiden
text: While you control Daenerys Targaryen, you may marshal facedown cards attached to Dothraki Handmaiden as if they were in your hand. Marshaling Action: Reveal an attachment from your hand. Attach it to Dothraki Handmaiden facedown as an attachment.
label: Dothraki Handmaiden

name: Horselord
text: While Horselord is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each other attacking Dothraki character you control.
flavor: The horselords might put on rich fabrics and sweet perfumes when they visited the Free Cities, but out under the open sky they kept the old ways.
label: Horselord

name: Brown Ben Plumm
text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have no gold in your gold pool, sacrifice Brown Ben Plumm.
flavor: "There are old sellswords and bold sellswords, but no old bold sellswords."
label: Brown Ben Plumm

name: Womb of the World
text: Action: Kneel Womb of the World to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may chose a Dothraki character revealed this way and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Womb of the World (DotE)

name: Pentos
text: Reaction: After you draw an attachment, kneel Pentos to reveal that attachment and put it into play. Then, draw a card.
flavor: "There are orchards, farms, mines ... I own some such myself, though I seldom visit them. Why should I spend my days out here, with the myriad delights of Pentos close at hand?" <cite>Magister Illyrio</cite>
label: Pentos

name: Khaleesi
text: Lady character only. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Khaleesi to, either: stand attached character, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge.
label: Khaleesi

name: Dragon Egg
text: Attached character gains insight. Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, if attached character is Daenerys Targaryen, sacrifice Dragon Egg to search your deck for a Hatchling character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
label: Dragon Egg

name: Pit Fighter's Blade
text: Attached character gains renown during [military] challenges.
flavor: No one wore armor in the fighting pits. It was blood the crowds came for: death, dismemberment, and the shrieks of agony, the music of scarlet sands.
label: Pit Fighter's Blade

name: Overwhelming Numbers
text: Play only during a challenge in which you control 2 or more attacking Dothraki characters. Action: Put up to 2 Dothraki characters into play from your hand and/or discard pile knelt, participating as attackers. At the end of the challenge, if any of those characters are still in play, return them to your hand. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Overwhelming Numbers

name: Fire Made Flesh
text: Marshaling Action: Sacrifice a Hatchling character to search your hand and deck for a Dragon character with the same title and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "For dragons are fire made flesh, and fire is power." <cite>Quaithe of the Shadow</cite>
label: Fire Made Flesh

name: Incinerate
text: Action: Choose a participating character and discard 1 or more cards from your hand. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -2 STR for each card discarded this way.
label: Incinerate

name: Delena Florent
text: During the challenges phase, non-Bastard characters cannot stand. Reaction: After Delena Florent enters play, search your deck for a Bastard character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Delena Florent

name: Dragonstone Convert
text: Challenges Action: Name an event. Until the end of the phase, events with that title cannot be played. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Dragonstone Convert

name: Hotho Humpback
text: Challenges Action: Each player draws 1 card. Each player checks reserve. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Rodrik has no daughters, only books. Hotho will be his heir, and I will be the king." <cite>Victarion Greyjoy</cite>
label: Hotho Humpback

name: Ten Towers Galley
text: While Ten Towers Galley is standing, reduce the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot by 1. Action: Kneel a location with printed cost 2 or higher to kneel Ten Towers Galley. Any player may initiate this ability.
label: Ten Towers Galley

name: Ser Meryn Trant
text: Interrupt: When a card is discarded from an opponent's hand, remove it from the game instead of placing it in his or her discard pile.
flavor: Ser Meryn Trant simply did not care.
label: Ser Meryn Trant

name: The Red Keep
text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered character, location, or attachment ability would initiate, kneel The Red Keep to cancel those effects. +1 Income.
label: The Red Keep (DotE)

name: Spotted Sylva
text: Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Spotted Sylva is attacking, each player must choose a participating character he or she controls, if able, and return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: "I should be honored if you'd let me serve you."
label: Spotted Sylva

name: Choosing the Spear
text: Reaction: After a [martell] character you control is declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. If you lose the challenge, choose and kill a character you control. (Max 1 per challenge.)
label: Choosing the Spear

name: Clydas
text: Action: Move 1 gold from an opponent's gold pool to your own. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "I am being foolish, Lord Commander, but ... this letter frightens me."
label: Clydas (DotE)

name: Cage of Ravens
text: Steward character only. Action: Kneel Cage of Ravens to put a card with printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand.
label: Cage of Ravens

name: Wylla Manderly
text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, choose another card in your discard pile and place it on the bottom of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)
flavor: "He was our king! He was brave and good, and the Freys murdered him. If Lord Stannis will avenge him, we should join Lord Stannis."
label: Wylla Manderly

name: Fight to the Last
text: Interrupt: When a character you control would be killed, save it, stand it, and set its STR to 1 until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).
flavor: Crossbow bolts thudded into the wood, one two three, as he flung it down on top of his king.
label: Fight to the Last

name: Mathis Rowan
text: Action: Choose an opponent and a character, location, or attachment you control. That player takes control of that card. Then, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "Mathis Rowan is sensible, prudent, well liked..." <cite>Ser Kevan Lannister</cite>
label: Mathis Rowan

name: Champion's Favor
text: Lady character only. Action: Kneel attached character to choose a participating non-Lady character and give it +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is 2 higher than attached character's STR.
label: Champion's Favor

name: Lysa Arryn
text: Interrupt: When Lysa Arryn is killed, choose another character, location, or attachment and remove it from the game.
flavor: "We keep no headsman in the Eyrie, my lord of Lannister. Open the Moon Door."
label: Lysa Arryn

name: Tormund Giantsbane
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tormund Giantsbane is participating, place a tale token on him. Action: Discard 1 tale token from Tormund Giantsbane to give a Wildling character +2 STR and renown until the end of the phase.
label: Tormund Giantsbane

name: Archmaester Marwyn
text: Once per phase, you may marshal or play a facedown card under your agenda as if it were in your hand. Reaction: After Archmaester Marwyn enters play, place the top 2 cards of your deck facedown under your agenda.
label: Archmaester Marwyn

name: Braavos
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Braavos to gain X gold. X is the number of different factions among characters you control.
flavor: The Titan of Braavos ... was a giant as tall as a mountain, and whenever Braavos stood in danger he would wake with fire in his eyes, his rocky limbs grinding and groaning as he waded out into the sea to smash the enemies.
label: Braavos

name: Water Dancer's Sword
text: Character with printed STR 3 or lower only. Ambush (1). Attached character gets +2 STR. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, return Water Dancer's Sword to hand.
label: Water Dancer's Sword

name: Lay Waste
text: Dominance Action: Choose a non-limited location or attachment and discard it from play. Then, that card's owner may search his or her deck for a location or attachment with lower printed cost, put it into play, and shuffle his or her deck.
label: Lay Waste

name: Bribery
text: Action: Choose and kneel a character with printed cost X or lower. If that character has the Ally or Mercenary trait, you may take control of it instead.
flavor: The gaoler's eyes had gone big as boiled eggs as he yanked open the drawstring and beheld the glint of gold.
label: Bribery (DotE)

name: Fury of the Khalasar
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, put a Dothraki character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
label: Fury of the Khalasar

name: The Lost Message
text: Action: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player adds the top X cards of his or her deck to his or her hand. X is the number of cards he or she shuffled this way. (Limit once per round.)
label: The Lost Message

name: The White Swords
text: When Revealed: You may put a Kingsguard character into play from your hand or discard pile.
label: The White Swords

name: Champion's Challenge
text: Reaction: After an opponent initiates a challenge against you, kneel a character with the highest STR among character you control to end the challenge with no winner or loser. (Limit once per phase.)
label: Champion's Challenge

name: At the Palace of Sorrows
text: Set each character's STR to 3.
label: At the Palace of Sorrows (DotE)

name: Loan from the Iron Bank
text: While Loan from the Iron Bank is in your used pile, reduce the gold value on your revealed plot by 1.
label: Loan from the Iron Bank

name: The Prince Who Came Too Late
text: Standing Action: Search your deck for a character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)
label: The Prince Who Came Too Late
